title: Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo
description: When selecting the menu options, only 6 of them are enabled. However, none of them perform any action. The enabled menu entries are: open declaration, open type hierarchy, open super implementation, show in packages view, copy, and search. It seems that the copy option is supposed to have a functionality, but it doesn't work currently (see bug 18015). This issue is marked as major and is likely to affect many users. The rest of the content in the bug report is irrelevant and should be removed.
OB: Only 6 menu entries are enabled, but they do not perform any actions.
SR: Disable the menu entries that do not perform any actions.
